subject: Re: [junit] Getting the Testing Bug
msgSnippet: ... Agreed! Several good point in the article, and several old habits I m glad to say I ve forgotten about - but I proudly still wear the scars... Thanks,
messageBody:
> On Thursday, January 22, 2004, at 6:27:18 PM, Mike Clark wrote:
>
> > It's probably preaching to the choir on this list, but java.net has
> > published my article titled "A Dozen Ways to Get the Testing Bug in the
> > New Year":
>
> > http://today.java.net/pub/a/today/2004/01/22/DozenWays.html
>
> Congratulations! Thanks!
>
> Ron Jeffries

Agreed! Several good point in the article, and several old habits
I'm glad to say I've forgotten about - but I proudly still wear
the scars...

Thanks, Derek
=====================================
--- The Gunslinger
